title: Teacher-Led Pedagogical Workshop for Designing Adaptive Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational theory knowledge and LMS (Learning Management System) experience
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen competencies in designing adaptive learning systems for mathematics education.

learning_goals: Based on learner data analysis, three requirements for designing customized learning pathways in mathematics can be derived.
A prototype design document can be created by applying a teacher-led scenario-based requirements-gathering process.
In resource-constrained environments, core success factors (CSFs) can be identified, and an evaluation rubric reflecting them can be developed.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
